General.Name: Nightingale Intelligent Sys
General.Description: Nightingale Intelligent Systems, Inc. provides unmanned aerial systems for the enterprise, defense, and emergency response applications in the United States, the European Union, Australia, Saudi Arabia, and Brazil. It provides Blackbird UAV, a mission-ready drone that airborne in less than 30 seconds; base station houses and charges that offers command and control for the Blackbird UAV; and Intelligent Mission Control software, which equips security teams with a real-time decision support system. The company was incorporated in 2014 and is based in Newark, California.
